name: Snitch (l33tsauce)
description:
Very Early development as part of Brackey's Game Jam 2021. 

Robbers run around and try to brake objects as fast as they can. The guard tries to catch as many robbers as he can. The person with the most catches or breaks wins. Score screen is shown at the end.

There was meant to be an evidence trading screen so the guard can convince the robbers to snitch on their robber buddies in exchange for lower sentences. The goal of the Guard is to get as high of prison sentences as possible, and the goal of the robbers is to escape as much jail time as possible. Not sticking together will definitely upset your partners.
